response.answer_text: Starting a gadget blog , if you have the passion for it  is not only exciting , but along the way  you also  get  freebies  and heaps of gadget review requests.  I have been gadget blogging for a while now at my blog Technology Australia The gadget guide and loving it. I get to write reviews on my website about gadgets that I love as well as  write about stuff that people send me.  Many people think that starting a blog is a hard and technical process to do, but it is not .    I have had many people contact me over the years  asking how to start a gadget review blog,  well to keep it  simple  you can  use wordpress to create the blog easily.  Wordpress can  be used not only for a gizmo blog , but also  for any hobby blog like a  technology blog , mums blog , fashion blog ,  travel blog and niche blogs. The beauty of a self hosted wordpress website is  that you have full control over your blog , unlike some off the free platform available like blogger , tumblr , etc Short step guide to creating your first gadget blog (visual detailed guide below)1.   Register a domain name for your blog2.   Setup web hosting to host your blog content3.   Install a free copy of WordPress to run your blog4.   Write your first blog post! So how do you create the blog Its best you check out my visual step by step blog creation guide here  to get to know in detail how to start a blog, however to explain it  now-  you need to  get a hosting partner  that will give you a hosting + domain free  to set up your blog  and then also have a 1 click install for wordpress which is the blog software.  With this package  you get a  domain name  and a place to host your blog  and you can easily start up your blog in a couple of clicks with 1 click install Don’t worry wordpress is very customisable and you can change the design of your site easily to make it look how you want in a few clicks with a new wordpress theme or skin. Once you install your blog via the 1 click install (check step by step guide link above), you just need to login into the wordpress admin dashboard and you can  change  widgets , look  of your site ,  title , logo, description , add free plugins for added functionality . It’s very easy  and anybody can do it. Good luck

Let’s come to the actual point which is “Gadget Review” because I just don’t want to make it another “How to Start a Blog” kind of stuff.  As you wanna start a Gadget Review Blog so be focused on some basic things from the very beginning. Which are, You have to be well aware of different Hardware & Software specs with necessary details for the respective gadgets.You have to be well versed in all Technical Functionalities (not just names) of different gadgets from Smartphones to RC Drones (based on your preferred area).Do you have a Solid pipeline of getting access to all new gadgets which have just released or about to release in the market? Otherwise if you are just thinking of rehashing another Bloggers post that will never ever help you to build your own credibility or name. So think about it!In the beginning start with a Micro Niche (on a particular type of gadget) on which you are comfortable enough.Avidly Read, Follow & build network with other gadget bloggers. It will help you to sharpen your knowledge & you will get to know the style/ trends.After looking into all these detail then jump onto setting up your Blog (Literally & technically) and Start Blogging :)

Starting a review blog is one of the best ways to not only create a site, it’s also a great way to make money as well. WordPress is the best platform for setting all of this up. The first thing you will need is a domain name, then a web hosting plan and installing WordPress to power the site and manage your content.  You can also download a premium theme for your site to make it stand out from the crowd. When it comes to the monetization of your site, Google Adsense and affiliate marketing are probably two of the best options to choose from. Also take a look at other gadget review sites to see what type of content they are creating and how they are posting reviews on their sites.
